1.effect: Marks the closest allied unit. When Enraged, also marks the furthest allied unit.

2.name: Break the Chains
2.type: Cooldown/s
2.effect:
Gains a shield that absorbs 7500HP (10500 at Level 1) Physical/Arts damage. If the shield is not broken within 15s (10s at Level 1), deals 600% of ATK as Arts splash damage to all allied units in a 3 tile radius and removes the shield.
Does not attack, move, and becomes unbalance immune while shielded.
Can only trigger when there is an allied unit within a 3 tile radius.

3.name: Break the Chains [Enraged]
3.type: Cooldown/s
3.effect:
Gains a shield that absorbs 9000HP (12000 at Level 1) Physical/Arts damage. If the shield is not broken within 15s (10s at Level 1), deals 800% of ATK as Arts splash damage to all allied units in a 3 tile radius and removes the shield.
Does not attack, move, and becomes unbalance immune while shielded.
Can only trigger when there is an allied unit within a 3 tile radius.

name: 'Essence of Evolution'
description: A madman who should not have stepped upon this world. An oddity that should not have existed in the other world. The union of the two gave birth to this node of 'evolution' that far surpasses the limits of biology. It's existence naturally contradicts all of Terra. It should not live. It must not live.
ability: Unable to move; Will evolve after a certain duration or when HP falls below a certain threshold; Periodically creates Originiutant Excrescence or Originiutant Tumor; Periodically deals a large amount of True damage to all deployed Operators; During [Newborn Form], greatly reduce Physical and Arts damage taken from units to the left; During [Evolution Form], greatly reduce Physical and Arts damage taken from units to the right; During [Perfect Form], massively reduce Physical and Arts damage taken, however lose HP every second.
talent:
Does not move, cannot be blocked, unbalance immune, does not attack.

Newborn Form (Initial): when taking Physical/Arts damage from the left side, damage scale is decreased by 80%.
Summons an enemy unit every 5s.
After 100s or when HP drops below 60%, enters Evolution Form.

Evolution Form: gains invulnerability for 10s.
When taking Physical/Arts damage from the right side, damage scale is decreased by 80%. Summons an enemy unit every 3s.
After 100s or when HP drops below 20%, enters Perfect Form.

Perfect Form: gains invulnerability for 10s.
Takes 99% reduced Physical/Arts damage from outside sources. Takes 300 True damage every second. Summons an enemy unit every 2s.

0.name: Charged Strike [Newborn Form]
0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect: Triggers an alarm for 7.17s, then deals 600 True damage (900 True damage at Level 1) to all allied units.

1.name: Charged Strike [Evolution Form]
1.type: Cooldown/s
1.effect: Triggers an alarm for 7.17s, then deals 700 True damage (1000 True damage at Level 1) to all allied units.

2.name: Charged Strike [Perfect Form]
2.type: Cooldown/s
2.effect: Triggers an alarm for 7.17s, then deals 800 True damage (1200 True damage at Level 1) to all allied units.

name: 'Emperor's Blade', Pursuer
description: He once ravaged the demons of the Northern Tundra, segregating the outsiders beyond the reach of civilization; His blade shies not from royals nor nobles, safeguarding glory from the dusts of rebellion. Every Royal Guard is as a dominion; the land beneath their feet is all the territory of Ursus.
ability: Whenever a certain percentage of HP is lost, unleashes the permanent terrain effect [Dominion], significantly reducing allied units' ASPD and reducing Physical and Arts damage taken by self when within its effect (Prioritizes targeting the ally unit outside of [Dominion] with the highest damage dealt to self); Casts [Collapsing Fear] which deals Arts damage to nearby units, instantly defeating the target if they are within [Dominion]; The first time HP drops to 0, casts [Collapsing Fear] on the entire battlefield; During his second form, his attacks and skills are more powerful.
talent:
[Dominion]: has a range of a rhombus with a 3 tile side length. Activates 1.45s after release, dealing 100% of ATK as Arts splash damage in a 1.8 tile radius from the center.
When activated, allied units within [Dominion] have their ASPD reduced by 50. When this unit is present within [Dominion], it takes 50% reduced Physical/Arts damage.
[Dominion] lasts indefinitely and does not stack.
Upon defeat, the ASPD reduction within [Dominion] also applies to enemies.

First Form (Initial): for every 50% HP lost, targets a unit outside [Dominion] that dealt the highest damage to self and activates [Dominion] at their location, clearing the damage record. When more than one target exists, select the unit with the highest Taunt outside [Dominion]. When no target exists, activate [Dominion] at self's location.

Resurrection: after being defeated for the first time, resurrects over 7.2s and restores 100% HP. When resurrecting, deals 100% of ATK as Arts damage to all allied units and forcibly retreat selectable allied units within [Dominion].
After resurrecting, switch to Second Form, clears damage record, and gains invulnerability for 10s.

Second Form: ATK is increased by 50%, melee attacks deal 250% of ATK as Physical damage.
For every 25% HP lost, targets a unit outside [Dominion] that dealt the highest damage to self and activates [Dominion] at their location, clearing the damage record. When more than one target exists, select the unit with the highest Taunt outside [Dominion]. When no target exists, activate [Dominion] at self's location.

0.name: Collapsing Fear [First Form]
0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect:
Deals 200% of ATK as Arts splash damage to allied units in a 2 tile radius.
Forcibly retreat selectable allied units within [Dominion].

1.name: Collapsing Fear [Second Form]
1.type: Cooldown/s
1.effect:
Deals 200% of ATK as Arts splash damage to allied units in a 2.5 tile radius.
Forcibly retreat selectable allied units within [Dominion].

name: Sal Viento Bishop Quintus
description: A member of the Church of the Deep who snuck into disaster-ravaged Iberia. He changed the law of the land through his sincere beliefs, in pursuit of the perfect form, yet he was unable to fathom the will of the ocean. Then again, who could?
ability: Attacks two targets with the highest DEF simultaneously; [Great Tide] deals Arts damage and Nervous Impairment to all allied units; [Collapse] deals Physical damage to multiple allied units; [Fragmentation] summons its offspring to entwine themselves around allied units and Stun them; [Species Outbreak] removes all Life Points when a long time has passed in the battle.
talent:
Massive unit: hitbox is a rectangle with side lengths 4.95 × 2.95 shifted 1 tile up. Cannot be blocked, cannot move.
Normal attacks prioritize allied units with the highest DEF. Can attack up to 2 targets. Attacks deal 20% of ATK as Nervous Impairment.

While in the First Form, after losing 33% HP or after 75s, switch to Second Form and alters skill cycle.
In the Second Form, ATK is increased by 40%. After losing 33% HP or after 200s, switch to Third Form and alters skill cycle.
In the Third Form, ATK is increased by 70%.

0.name: Great Tide
0.type: Cooldown/s

1.name: Collapse

3.name: Species Outbreak

name: Pancho Salas
description: Pancho Salas, an old veteran piloting a heavily modified motorboat. Even should his vessel be destroyed, he will never falter before reaching his goal.
ability: Summons 'Kite' to fight alongside explosive boats; attacks the unit with the highest Max HP with the water cannon and continuously deals Arts damage and Corrosion Damage. During the second form, periodically attacks all surrounding units; attacks the unit with the highest DEF with the firearm and reduces the unit's DEF. When defeats a unit or gets defeated, increases the ATK and Movement Speed of all enemy units.
talent:
First Form (Initial): does not attack, immune to Erosion.

Resurrection: upon being defeated for the first time, ends the current wave, resurects over 3.5s and restores 100% HP. After a certain period, if checkpoint (4, 8) ((2, 6) at Level 1) is not reached, blink to checkpoint.
After resurrecting, switch to Second Form and gains invulnerability for 10s.

Second Form: attck range reduced to 1.3 radius, attacks deal 30% of ATK as Erosion damage.
Upon killing a unit or when defeated, all enemies gain 100 ASPD and Movement Speed is increased by 150% for 10s.

0.name: Summon Kite [First Form]
0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect: Attempts to summon Kite at specific locations.

1.type: Cooldown/s
1.effect: Summons Pancho's Explosive Boat at specific locations and paths.

2.name: Water Cannon [First Form]
2.type: Cooldown/s
2.effect: Locks onto an allied unit with the highest max HP and fires, dealing 20% of ATK as Arts damage and Erosion damage every second for 5s.

3.name: Firearm Attack [Second Form]
3.type: Cooldown/s
3.effect: Attacks 3 times, selecting the allied unit with the highest DEF each time, reducing their DEF by 50% for 10s (does not stack) then deals 50% of ATK as Physical damage.

4.name: Water Cyclone [Second Form]
4.type: Attack Recovery
4.effect: Deals 100% of ATK as Physical damage and 30% of ATK as Erosion damage to all allied units in a 1.7 tile radius.

name: Mandragora
description: One of the leaders of the Dublinn forces, a caster who controls stone. Emerging from the darkness of Victoria, she has sworn to repay the humiliation she suffered at the hands of the nobles manyfold.
ability: [Stoneshield] Reduces damage taken, temporarily loses effect after being hit by a Tattered Pillar; [Mandragora's Gaze] Targets the unit with the highest ATK within range, dealing Arts damage and reducing their ASPD. If the target is retreated or defeated, destroy the tile the unit was on; In her second form, [Stoneshield] also grants Low-Altitude Hovering, and Mandragora becomes able to knock down Tattered Pillars.
talent:
Gains [Stoneshield] upon appearing on the battlefield.
[Stoneshield] reduces incoming Physical/Arts damage by 60% (65% at Level 1). After taking damage from a Tattered Pillar, [Stoneshield] is deactivated.
When [Stoneshield] is deactivated, interrupts channeling skill and causes it to enter cooldown. While [Stoneshield] is deactivated, cannot use skills and skill cooldown is paused.
25s after [Stoneshield] is deactivated, or when HP drops below 40% (35% at Level 1), restores [Stoneshield].

First Form (Initial): uses melee attacks when blocked, dealing Arts damage. Does not use ranged attacks.
Upon being defeated for the first time, resurrects over 5s and restores 100% HP. After resurrecting, switch to Second Form and ends the current wave.

Second Form: gains [Stoneshield], invulnerability for 3s, and resets the cooldown of [Mandragora's Gaze]. Can use ranged attacks that deal Arts damage.
[Stoneshield] grants Low-Altitude Hovering. While [Stoneshield] persists, deals 30% of ATK as Arts splash damage to allied units within a 1.7 tile radius every second.

0.name: Mandragora's Gaze
0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect:
When this skill is activated: if this skill is not already active, channels for 7.1s. Resets cooldown of this skill if cast during channel. Channel is immediately stopped when silenced or stunned. 6s after channeling, enters cooldown. When exiting the channel, stop this skill's effects and enter cooldown.
During the channel, locks onto an allied unit within 1.5 tile radius (1.6 tile radius at Level 1), dealing 100% of ATK as Arts damage and reduces the target's ASPD by 70%. If the target is retreated during the channel, summons a Sealed Floor in their place.

1.name: Collapse [Second Form]
1.type: Cooldown/s
1.effect: Select the closest Tattered Pillar with Operators within range, causing it to face the direction with the most Operators, and collapse after 5s.

name: The Blood Knight Dikaiopolis
description: The Blood Knight, Dikaiopolis. The originator of Kazimierz's Infected Knight program, the hero of the Grand Knight Territory's Infected, and an idol to countless children. What exactly did the 'hero' give up to obtain the peace we know today?
ability: Reduce damage taken, however this effect is ineffective against the unit blocking self; 'Exsanguination': Stun the target and deal Arts damage every second; After the HP of his first form drops to 0, enters 'Resurrection Stance'. During this period, the Blood Knight is invulnerable and continuously summons Bloodblades, and enters the second form after some time. If the Blood Knight's HP is restored to its maximum while in 'Resurrection Stance', he will return to his first form; During his second form, he has increased ATK, uses ranged attacks, and continuously summons Bloodblades.
talent:
When Bloodblades enter within a 0.5 tile radius of self, heal self for 10% HP and kills the Bloodblade.

First Form (Initial): only uses melee attacks that deals Physical damage.
When taking damage from a unit that isn't blocking it, damage scale is reduced to 75%.
Resurrects over 0.5s when defeated, restores 50% HP, and enters Resurrection Stance.

Resurrection Stance: is invulnerable, binded, unblockable, and disarmed.
Enters First Form when HP reaches 100%, or enters Second Form after 60s.

Second Form: ends current wave and gains invulnerability for 6s.
ATK is increased by 50%. When taking Physical/Arts damage from a unit that isn't blocking it, reduce damage taken by 50%.
Can use ranged attacks that deal Physical damage in a 1.3 tile radius.

0.name: Exsanguination
0.type: Cooldown/s

1.effect: Summons a large number of Bloodblades along a set path.

2.name: Bloodblade [Second Form]
2.type: Cooldown/s
2.effect: Summons Bloodblades along a set path.

name: Degenbrecher
description: Three-time champion of the Kazimierz Major, a defective Leithanian unable to use Arts, a natural-born warrior—The Black Knight.
ability: Immune to Frozen and gains resistance; ATK increases during snowfall and, when blocked, attacks against the blocker ignore a certain amount of DEF; [Swift Slayer] When blocked, bypasses the target and deals Physical damage to units along the path; [Brutalizing Blizzard] Deals Physical damage to units in the surrounding area; During her second form, gain Invisibility, attacks ignore more DEF and deal damage twice, [Momentum Murder] Whenever 25% HP is lost, clears the SP of all allied units in range and prevent the targets from attacking or healing for some time.
talent:
First Form (Initial): has Resist. During snowfall, ATK is increased by 30%.
When dealing damage to the blocking unit, ignores 20% of the target's DEF.
Resurrects when defeated, restoring 100% HP over 5s, switching to Second Form and gaining invulnerability for 10s.

Second Form: gains invisibility. During snowfall, ATK is increased by 50%. Normal attacks hit twice.
When dealing damage to the blocking unit, ignores 40% of the target's DEF.
Unleashes [Momentum Murder] for every 25% of max HP lost, clearing the SP of allied units in a 2.8 tile radius and causing them to be disarmed and unable to gain SP through any means for 10s.

0.name: Swift Slayer
0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect:
Triggers upon being blocked: gains unblockable for 1s, and blinks 1.5 tiles to the next checkpoint (blinks forward if no checkpoint exists).
Blink lasts 0.5s, during which gains unblockable, invulnerable, and unbalance immunity.
0.3s after the trigger, deals 150% of ATK as Physical damage to the formerly blocking unit.
Second Form: deals an additional instance of damage.
If blink destination is terrain, blink will not activate (unblockable and invulnerable status will still trigger).

1.name: Brutalizing Blizzard
1.type: Cooldown/s
1.effect: Deals 100% of ATK as Physical damage to allied units in a 1.5 tile radius. Second Form: deals an additional instance of damage.

name: 'Sui-Xiang'
description: The shadow of the bestial Sui, towering and venerable. It casts its lazy gaze upon the mortal realm, and in the blink of an eye a thousand years have come and gone. With the millennium passing like a dream, it is uncertain whether it is feeling anger or bitterness.
ability: Reduces damage taken from above and below; When defeated during its Stage 1 or 2 form, after a period of time, the unit takes its next form and reappears a certain distance to the right; [Faraway Mountains' Thunderclap] Deals continuous Arts damage to units within cross areas around three ranged units; [Heavensfall] Deals Physical damage twice to melee units and additionally inflicts continuous Arts damage that slowly increases over time (can be resisted); [Omnidirectional Breath] Inflicts continuous damage to a large area to the right and renders the tiles no longer available for deployment; Operators in the left side of the target area can reduce damage taken by allied units to the right and mitigate damage to the tiles.
talent:
The stats of each form changes depending on the stage.

Massive unit: hitbox is a rectangle with side lengths 3.95 × 4.95 shifted 2 tiles up and 0.5 tiles left. Cannot be blocked, cannot move.
When taking Physical/Arts damage from above or below the hitbox, reduce the damage taken by 50% (80% in Second and Third Form).

Preparation Phase (Initial): disappears and stops SP regen. After 20 enemies have left the battlefield, appears after a delay of 2s.
Upon appearing, forcibly retreats allied units within its hitbox and seals the tiles it occupies, then changes to the appropriate form. After changing form, remove the sealed tiles and gains invulnerability for 4s.

Special aggro: prioritize melee units closest to itself. ASPD is fixed at 3.267s.
In the Third Form, attacks up to 2 targets. When Wisps enter its hitbox, kill them and restore a certain amount of SP.

IW-9
Gains 20000 HP and 100 ATK with each form change; loses 50 DEF in Second and Third Form.
Third Form appearance delay increased to 3s. After entering the Third Form, display SP bar for [Omnidirectional Breath]. Each Wisp restores 3 SP.

IW-EX-8
Gains 10000/15000 HP in the Second and Third Form; gains 100 ATK and loses 5 RES in Third Form.
Second Form appearance delay decreased to 1s. After entering the Third Form, display SP bar for [Omnidirectional Breath]. Each Wisp restores 2 SP.

0.name: Termination
0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect:
Can only be used after 540s (600s in Third Form) has passed.
Gains invulnerability and deducts 999 HP seals.

1.name: Faraway Mountains' Thunderclap
1.type: Cooldown/s
1.effect:
Selects 3 targets and generate a thunderfall area on each target and the 4 adjacent tiles for 15s. Every thunderfall area deals 13% of ATK as Arts damage to all units within every 1.5s.

IW-9
Cooldown: 10/18, 80/25, 80/30 for each form.

IW-EX-8
Cooldown: 10/18, 80/25, 75/30 for each form.

2.name: Heavensfall [Second and Third Form]
2.type: Cooldown/s
2.effect:
Selects 1 target and drops a claymore on them, dealing 130% of ATK as Physical damage twice and causing them to take a certain amount of Arts damage every second for 15s.
Damage begins at 10% of ATK and is increased by another 10% for every 2 successful damage ticks.

IW-9
Cooldown: 5/20, 95/20 for each form.
In the Third Form, Physical damage is lowered to 120% of ATK twice and Arts damage scales by 15% of ATK every 3 successful damage ticks.

IW-EX-8
Cooldown: 5/20, 90/20 for each form.
In the Second Form, Physical damage is lowered to 120% of ATK twice and Arts damage scales by 20% of ATK every 3 successful damage ticks.
In the Third Form, Physical damage is lowered to 120% of ATK twice and Arts damage scales by 20% of ATK every 3 successful damage ticks, and the duration is lowered to 12s.

3.name: Omnidirectional Breath [Third Form]
3.type: Cooldown/s
3.effect:
Fires dragon breath at the 5 rows to its right for 5s. For each row, the breath deals 35% of ATK as Physical and Arts damage to the leftmost allied unit and 15% of ATK as Physical and Arts damage to all allied units after. All unoccupied tiles left of the leftmost allied unit will be sealed.
60 SP is required for the activation of this skill. Initial SP is set at 50. Recovery type is automatic.

IW-EX-8
Initial cooldown is reduced to 0s.

name: Andoain, the 'Martyr'
description: A Sankta who made an enemy of Laterano for the sake of asking a question. A Pathfinder who tread the path of peril for the sake of receiving an answer. He feels neither wrath nor sorrow. He neither curses God, nor beseeches man. Andoain only follows his own path, wherever it may end.
ability: Cannot be blocked. While holding Ammo, this unit gains increased ATK, and attacks will cause Ammo to bounce to a nearby target, up to a maximum of 5 bounces, dealing additional damage to 'Gelato Stops'. Ammo capacity: 5; After losing a certain percentage of HP, creates a permanent field effect, 'Light Unto Sufferers'. Enemies standing on 'Light Unto Sufferers' take reduced Physical and Arts Damage and gain 50% Physical and Arts Dodge. After being defeated once, enters his Second Form, gaining increased ATK and periodically using 'Ashes to Ashes, Dust to Dust': Andoain stops attacking and scans the battlefield from left to right, locking onto at most 5 targets before dealing massive Physical Damage to them and fully replenishing his Ammo.
talent:
Cannot be blocked.
Displays Ammo bar. Initial and max Ammo is 5.

[Light Unto Sufferers]: activates after a delay of 1.45s. Places a rhombus with a 3 tile side length that grants all enemy units within 50% Physical/Arts dodge and 30% reduced Physical/Arts damage. Lasts infinitely and does not stack.

First Form (Initial): for every 50% of max HP lost, casts [Light Unto Sufferers] centered on itself.
When defeated in this form, resurrects over 5s, restoring 100% of HP, and enters the Second Form.

Second Form: ends the current wave and gains invulnerability for 20s.
ATK is increased by 20%. For every 25% of max HP lost, casts [Light Unto Sufferers] centered on itself.

0.name: Bouncing Round
0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect:
Consumes 1 Ammo and launches a bouncing round at the target, dealing 150% of ATK as Physical damage. Deals an extra 500% of ATK as Physical damage to "Gelato Stops".
The round then bounces to a random allied unit or "Ice Cream Machine" within the surrounding 8 tiles (prioritizing "Gelato Stops") for up to 5 hits in total.

1.name: Ashes to Ashes, Dust to Dust [Second Form]
1.type: Cooldown/s
1.effect:
For 10s, scans the battlefield from left to right and locking onto the first 5 allied units or "Gelato Stops" (locks on from top to bottom within the same column).
After the scan, deals 200% of ATK as Physical damage to all locked-on and targetable units. Deals an extra 1000% of ATK as Physical damage to "Gelato Stops".
After the skill ends, restores 5 Ammo.

For the entire duration of the skill (12s), stops attacking or moving.
Only activates when there are targetable allied units on the battlefield.

name: Manfred
description: A young Sarkaz general, member of the Military Commission of Kazdel. After enlisting a large number of mercenaries in Londinium, he has assembled and trained a brand new type of fighting force. His Arts Unit 'Teekaz's Root' was bestowed upon him by Theresis, the Regent of Kazdel, who also taught him the swordsmanship he now employs.
ability: Uses his floating cannon to inflict Arts damage; Upon firing, floating cannon will charge up Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery. [Focus] Continuously gains ASPD when attacking the same target (this effect is capped), rapidly decaying when switching targets or not attacking for a few seconds; [Military Training] Has high Physical and Arts dodge, but after being bombarded by the City Defense Artillery, temporarily loses this dodge effect and is stunned for a few seconds; [From Withered Trunk, New Branches] When defeated for the first time, randomly attacks all targets on the battlefield with his floating cannon, greatly accelerating the charge rate of Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery; In his second form, draws his sword alongside his floating cannon to perform simultaneous Physical and Arts attacks.
talent:
This talent changes depending on the stage.

[Focus]: when normal attacks continuously hit the same target, each attack grants 60 ASPD stacking up to 5 times. All stacks are cleared when switching targets or if 6s passes without attacking.
[Military Training]: gains 80% Physical/Arts dodge. When taking damage from the Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery, lose this effect for 30s and become stunned for 8s.

First Form (Initial):attacks deal 50% of ATK as Arts damage. Every attack grants the Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery 3 SP.
Upon being defeated, ends the current wave, resurects over 20s, restores 100% of HP, and enters the Second Form.
While resurrecting, casts [From Withered Trunk, New Branches], attacking a random allied unit once every 0.8s and dealing 30% of ATK as Arts damage. Each attack grants the Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery 6 SP.

Second Form: gains invulnerability for 5s. Attacks deal 100% of ATK as Physical damage; controls a drone to attack the same target, dealing 50% of ATK as Arts damage.
Each attack from the drone grants the Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery 6 SP.

H10-1
Attacks in both forms deal an extra 20% of ATK as Necrosis damage. When hit by the Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery, the dodge effect is lost for only 12s.

H10-2
In the Second Form, the drone's attacks bounce between up to 2 targets in a 1.5 tile radius. If only one target exists, deals damage twice to the target. Attacks from the drone grants the Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery 12 SP.

H10-3
When hit by the Londinium Secondary Defense Artillery, the dodge effect is lost for only 8s.
[Halo]: while present on the battlefield, all "Reborn Creations" and enemies who are able to create "Reborn Creations" deal 5% of Manfried's ATK as Arts damage to all allied units in a 1.25 tile radius every 0.5s.

name: The Endspeaker, Will of We Many
description: The tiny Seaborn that haunted the mighty Stultifera, the blood of its parents once strewn across the ocean's waters. The revelation reaches not the ears of the children, their kind's destiny quietly continuing to flow.
ability: When defeated, disappears for a short time before evolving into its next form, gaining the following effects in turn: Gains increased DEF/Gains increased Movement Speed/Gains increased ATK and Lifesteal; [Consume] Consumes the Remains of its Seaborn kin, gaining their corresponding Directed Evolution ability in the next evolutionary phase, while also instantly defeating any Operators near the Remains and preventing them from being redeployed for a period of time.
talent:
Can resurrect once (3 times at Level 1 and 2).
Upon defeat, clears all buffs gained from [Directed Evolution] and moves itself to the next wave, resurrecting (restoring 100% of HP) in the process.
Resurrection completes at the end of the wave. After resurrecting, trigger Metamorphosis.

Metamorphosis
Gains invulnerability, invisibility, and becomes unable to move. Cannot attack or block.
During this period, triggers [Consume] and gains one of the following:
[Directed Evolution·Founder]: RES increased by 60.
[Directed Evolution·Predator]: gains 50% Physical/Arts dodge (disabled when under the effects of Stun/Sleep/Freeze/Levitate/Bind/Silence).
[Directed Evolution·Brandguider]: when HP falls below 40%, DEF is increased by 400%, Block count +1.
[Directed Evolution·Spewer]: when not blocked, can attack up to 3 targets.
[Directed Evolution·Swarmcaller]: becomes immune to sluggish. Gains Resist.
[Directed Evolution·Reefbreaker]: upon successfully dealing damage, ATK is increased by 8%, up to 20 stacks. 2 stacks decay every second 3.5s after attacks stop.

After triggering [Consume] once (twice at Level 2) or when no [Remains] exists on the field, remove all [Remains] and changes to the next form.

First Form (Initial): max HP -60%, ATK -100%, DEF -100%, Movement Speed +0.2.
Does not attack, cannot be blocked.

Second Form: max HP +200%, ATK -15%, RES +30, occupies +2 Block.
Attacks deal an extra 60% of ATK as Nervous Impairment.

(From Level 1 onward)

Third Form: max HP +150%, RES +30, Movement Speed +0.5, occupies +2 Block.

Fourth Form: max HP +300%, ATK +15%, RES +30, Movement Speed +0.5, occupies +2 Block.
After successfully dealing damage, heals for 140% of damage dealt.

0.name: Consume
0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect:
Select a tile containing a [Remains] (selects the tile with the most [Remains], otherwise selects the closest tile, otherwise selects the earliest [Remains]).

Forcibly retreat all allied units on the tile and the surrounding 4 tiles. Operators retreated have their Redeployment Time reset, but cannot be deployed again until the current form is defeated.

Consumes the [Remains] on the tile, gaining the corresponding [Directed Evolution] effect. Multiple effects of the same type does not stack.

name: Lost Colossus
description: An experimental creation of a certain caster from the Spires of Leithanien. This colossus was originally made to be a 'servant,' but the old Spire caster forgot to tell him who he should serve...

ability: 攻击造成<@eb.key>法术伤害</>，未被阻挡时，受到的物理或法术伤害减少50%，接触未激活的R系列动力装甲时，为其回复大量技力.
talent:
When entering a 1 tile radius of a R-series 动力装甲, grants it 100 SP and leaves the field.
When not blocked, takes 50% reduced Physical/Arts damage.

name: Dor-γ号改造体
description: 多萝西私自实验产出的造物。梦想终须反馈回现实，多萝西希望自己能成为温暖的庇护港湾。
ability: 攻击造成<@eb.key>法术伤害</>，未被阻挡时，受到的物理或法术伤害减少50%，接触未激活的R系列动力装甲时，为其回复大量技力.
talent:
When entering a 1 tile radius of a R-series 动力装甲, grants it 100 SP and leaves the field.
When not blocked, takes 50% reduced Physical/Arts damage.

name: 实验用动力装甲
description: 无人操控的动力装甲。不需要操控者在其中控制，但灵活度仍旧很高。
ability: None
talent: None

name: 测试用动力装甲
description: 无人操控的动力装甲。仿佛拥有自主意识一般，就连经验丰富的工程师也很难凭肉眼分辨是否有人操控。
ability: None
talent: None

name: R-31重型动力装甲
description: 大约半年前出现在某些雇佣兵团体中的型号，性能与五年前军方量产的相当。莱茵生命能量科的项目与多方合作，现在也在争取更多的合作机会。
ability: 对目标使用【超负载】，大幅提升攻击速度，每次攻击造成物理伤害，并使目标<$ba.stun>晕眩</>.
talent: None

0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect:
Targets the blocking unit, becomes unblocked, and attacks the target once every second, dealing 75% of ATK as Physical damage and stunning them for 2s. Lasts 10s.
Cannot move 1s after the skill ends. Ends the skill when the target leaves the field.

description: 大约半年前出现在某些雇佣兵团体中的型号，性能与五年前军方量产的相当。技术不被限定，哥伦比亚人在遵守法律的同时，总是乐意寻求效率更高的方式。
ability: 对目标使用【超负载】，大幅提升攻击速度，每次攻击造成物理伤害，并使目标<$ba.stun>晕眩</>.

name: R-11突击动力装甲
description: 搭载了远程武器的型号，攻击力大幅度增强。这类实验性质的武器即使技术仍处在原型阶段，威力和能量也绝对不容小觑。
ability: 同时攻击四个目标.
talent:
When blocked, uses melee attacks.
When unblocked, uses ranged attacks that hit up to 4 targets, dealing 50% of ATK as damage.

name: R-11a突击动力装甲
description: 搭载了远程武器的型号，攻击力大幅度增强。很难想象这种技术若是可以量产，将会带来怎样的改变。
ability: 同时攻击四个目标.
talent:
When blocked, uses melee attacks.
When unblocked, uses ranged attacks that hit up to 4 targets, dealing 50% of ATK as damage.

name: 多萝西
description: 多萝西·弗兰克斯，莱茵生命源石技艺应用科主任。借助科技与理想的力量，她希望人与人之间的差距可以被消除，弱小之人，能得到来自她的庇护。
ability: 无法被阻挡，部署陷阱，踩上去的友方单位受到<@eb.key>法术伤害</>且<$ba.stun>晕眩</>一段时间，撤回保护目标时不扣除关卡生命值.
talent: Cannot be blocked or unbalanced.

0.name: Deploy trap
0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect: Places a trap on a non-occupied tile in a 0.3 tile radius that lasts 999s. Traps explode when an allied unit is deployed on its tile, granting Dorothy +10% ATK (stacking up to 50 times), and dealing 150% of ATK as Arts damage and stunning the allied unit for 10s.

name: 酒类爱好者
description: 喝了点酒的杜林人。醉得恰到好处，以为自己正在大战邪恶生物。
ability: 初始拥有<@eb.key>100%物理闪避</>，持续一段时间.
talent: Gains 100% Physical dodge for 20s (can be silenced).

name: 酒类协会会员
description: 喝得烂醉的杜林人。“我没醉！谁说我醉了！是你吗？”
ability: 初始拥有<@eb.key>100%物理闪避</>，持续一段时间.
talent: Gains 100% Physical dodge for 30s (can be silenced).

name: 湖畔志愿者
description: 无所事事的业余救生员。因为实在没人可救，只好练练拳击，出乎意料的是天赋还不错。
ability: 生命值首次降至一半以下后获得<@eb.key>100%物理闪避</>，持续一段时间.
talent: When HP falls below 50%, gains 100% Physical dodge for 10s.

name: 湖畔救生员
description: 到处闲逛的专业救生员。身体强壮，肤色黝黑，给人充足的安全感。实际上不会游泳，是在室外高强度练拳时晒黑的。
ability: 生命值首次降至一半以下后获得<@eb.key>100%物理闪避</>，持续一段时间.
talent: When HP falls below 50%, gains 100% Physical dodge for 20s.

name: 沙堡建筑者
description: 把建造沙堡当兴趣的杜林人。对一切搅动人工湖水的人深恶痛绝，为此在建造工具上加装了施术单元。
ability: None
talent: None

name: 沙堡设计师
description: 把设计沙堡当职业的杜林人。对沙堡建不起来这件事已经习以为常，最近连设计图都不画了，专心鼓捣施术单元。
ability: None
talent: None

name: 排球发球车
description: 为了落单的游客设计的沙滩排球发球车。根本没人用，因为来打排球的人太多了。
ability: 每次攻击使自身攻击力提升（有上限），受到部分<$ba.debuff>异常状态</>时层数清空.
talent: After successfully attacking, ATK is increased by 10%, stacking up to 10 times (disabled when under Crowd Control).

name: 排球重扣车
description: 为了报复他人设计的沙滩排球重扣车。不停对着人发射势大力沉的扣球，争取把一切沙滩排球对局全搅黄。
ability: 每次攻击使自身攻击力提升（有上限），受到部分<$ba.debuff>异常状态</>时层数清空.
talent: After successfully attacking, ATK is increased by 15%, stacking up to 10 times (disabled when under Crowd Control).

name: 钢铁冲浪教练
description: 耐得住大风大浪的机器冲浪教练。缺点是尽管有防锈镀层还是容易生锈，再就是浮不起来。
ability: 可以<@eb.key>拦下<自走车></>，未被阻挡时受到的物理与法术伤害大幅降低.
talent:
Destroys 自走车 that it comes into contact with.
When not blocked, takes 50% reduced Physical/Arts damage.

name: 合金冲浪教练
description: 耐得住水渍腐蚀的机器冲浪教练。为了提高防锈性能选用了高密度稀有合金，所以更浮不起来了。
ability: 可以<@eb.key>拦下<自走车></>，未被阻挡时受到的物理与法术伤害大幅降低.
talent:
Destroys 自走车 that it comes into contact with.
When not blocked, takes 75% reduced Physical/Arts damage.

name: 全封闭沙滩车
description: 大家都喜欢的沙滩接驳车。除了司机还能载三个人。里面非常凉爽，很适合在沙滩上玩累了的人。
ability: 只能被阻挡数大于等于3的单位阻挡；周围有领袖以外的非机械敌人时会将其装载为乘客（最多3个），自身被击败时释放出乘客.
talent: None

name: 竞赛级沙滩车
description: 大家都喜欢的沙滩越野车。载客量不变，其余配置全面升级，尤其是空调，冻得司机和乘客们哆哆嗦嗦。
ability: 只能被阻挡数大于等于3的单位阻挡；周围有领袖以外的非机械敌人时会将其装载为乘客（最多3个），自身被击败时释放出乘客.
talent: None

name: 蜜酿级醒酒助手
description: 威震整片沙滩的强大机械。为一切醉酒的家伙提供水炮醒酒服务。美中不足的是，它不能识别谁喝醉了。
ability: 首次受到伤害后攻击速度与移动速度大幅提升，持续一段时间.
talent: After taking damage for the first time, gains 100 ASPD and 100% increased Movement Speed for 30s.

name: 烈酒级醒酒助手
description: 横扫整片沙滩的恐怖机械。一发超高功率水炮足以让烂醉如泥的家伙彻底清醒过来。被人偷偷改了判定逻辑，现在只轰清醒的人。
ability: 首次受到伤害后攻击速度与移动速度大幅提升，持续一段时间.
talent: After taking damage for the first time, gains 150 ASPD and 150% increased Movement Speed for 30s.

name: 自走车
description: 风靡际崖城的模块化自走车，现在订购《爆改！自走车疯狂大出击》即可免费获得基础型号一辆。
ability: 碰到敌人时对其造成<@eb.key>无视闪避的物理伤害</>与短暂<$ba.stun>晕眩</>，可以装配装备以获得额外性能.
talent:
Automatically destroyed after 60s.
After colliding with an enemy, deals 100% ATK as Physical damage (ignoring dodge) and stuns it for 1s. More functions can be added through modifications.

name: 食腐使徒
description: 食腐者大军成员之一，生存时间越久，越难以击倒。在传言中，他们能吸取敌人的力量，直到自身成长为一种最可怖的存在。
ability: 从“汲营枯枝”出场时，击倒过的敌人越多，<@eb.key>生命、攻击和防御会越强</>；释放<@eb.key>污染秽蚀</>，使周围我方持续损失生命.
talent: Upon spawn, max HP/ATK/DEF is lowered to the percentage of enemies defeated in the current stage (to a minimum of 20%, up to 80% if the stage has not ended, or not lowered when the stage ends). Allied melee/ranged units in a 1.1 tile radius take 50/25 True damage per second.

name: 萨卡兹枯朽战士
description: 食腐者大军成员之一，已被污染侵蚀，即使死亡也无法阻断他们对周围土地的污染。在倒下后，腐躯仍旧存在。
ability: 被击倒时释放<@eb.key>污染秽蚀</>，使周围我方持续损失生命.
talent: Upon death, releases a mist for 8s in a 2.0 tile radius which causes allied melee/ranged units to take 50/25 True damage per second.

name: 萨卡兹枯朽战士组长
description: 食腐者大军精锐成员之一，周身已被污染彻底侵蚀，死亡只会让他们造成更多污染，被污染的土地任何生灵都难以存活。在倒下后，腐躯难以彻底消失。
ability: 被击倒时释放<@eb.key>污染秽蚀</>，使周围我方持续损失生命.
talent: Upon death, releases a mist for 8s in a 2.0 tile radius which causes allied melee/ranged units to take 50/25 True damage per second.

name: 萨卡兹枯朽术师
description: 食腐者大军成员之一，在攻击敌人的同时，他们掌握了一部分治愈同类的力量。吞噬是食腐的起点，共享为生命的最终合流。
ability: 攻击造成<@eb.key>法术伤害</>，持续为<@eb.key>汲营枯枝</>恢复生命值.

description: 食腐者大军精锐成员之一，在攻击敌人的同时，他们完全掌握了治愈同类的力量。吞噬是食腐的起点，共享为生命的最终合流。

name: 枯朽之种
description: 食腐者之王的源石技艺造物，并无思想，却具有自毁性。死亡为食腐的基本，它们创造死亡。
ability: <@eb.key>【飞行单位】</>，接近干员时，自毁并对其造成物理伤害.
talent: Immediately dies after attacking.

name: 腐败之种
description: 食腐者之王的源石技艺造物，枯枝违背常理，摒弃苏生，直奔死亡。死亡为食腐的基本，它们创造死亡。
ability: <@eb.key>【飞行单位】</>，接近干员时，自毁并对其造成物理伤害.
talent: Immediately dies after attacking.

name: 逐腐兽
description: 食腐者之王的源石技艺造物，拥有较快的速度，无法理解何为治愈。制造死亡为它们生命的全部，因此当治愈的力量出现时，它们的能力将在目标身上失去效果。
ability: <@eb.key>行动速度较快</>，攻击使目标在一段时间内持续受到法术伤害，目标接受治疗时<@eb.key>解除此效果</>.
talent: The target it attacks takes 100 /Arts damage every second for 10s (this damage cannot kill). Repeated attacks refresh the duration. The effect is dispelled when the target is healed.

name: 疯狂的逐腐兽

ability: <@eb.key>行动速度较快</>，攻击使目标在一段时间内持续受到法术伤害，目标接受治疗时<@eb.key>解除此效果</>.

talent: The first time its HP drops below 50%, gains 100% Movement Speed and 100 ASPD, and gains stun immunity, freeze immunity, levitate immunity, and sleep immunity.

name: 萨卡兹王庭军术师
description: 萨卡兹王庭军术师，萨卡兹的巫术在战场上常常要比许多机械军事设备更加难以应对。他们的作战风格既有萨卡兹特色，又更具纪律性。
ability: 攻击额外造成<@eb.key>凋亡损伤</>，会锁定我方单位持续造成法术伤害，并在释放完成时造成<@eb.key>群体凋亡损伤</>.
talent: Attacks deal an extra 25% of ATK as Necrosis damage.

0.name: Death's Eye
0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect:
Channels upon an allied unit, dealing 40% of ATK as /Arts damage every second for 8s.

After the channel, deals 220% of ATK as Necrosis damage to the target and the adjacent 4 tiles.

Cannot be silenced during the channel.

name: 萨卡兹王庭军精锐术师
description: 萨卡兹王庭精锐军术师，萨卡兹的巫术在战场上常常要比许多机械军事设备更加难以应对。除却纪律性，在近几年的训练中，他们也表现出了极强的专业性。
ability: 攻击额外造成<@eb.key>凋亡损伤</>，会锁定我方单位持续造成法术伤害，并在释放完成时造成<@eb.key>群体凋亡损伤</>.
talent: Attacks deal an extra 25% of ATK as Necrosis damage.

0.name: Death's Eye
0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect:
Channels upon an allied unit, dealing 40% of ATK as /Arts damage every second for 8s.

After the channel, deals 200% of ATK as Necrosis damage to the target and the adjacent 4 tiles.

Cannot be silenced during the channel.

name: 特雷西斯
description: 特雷西斯，卡兹戴尔摄政王。已于伦蒂尼姆召集萨卡兹大军，并占领碎片大厦。如果无法阻止他向大公爵宣战，全面战争一触即发。
ability: 无法被攻击、消失时不会扣除关卡生命值；击倒一切拦路的目标.
talent: Invulnerable. Does not attack, does not block.

0.name: Kill
0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect: Fires a projectile towards the direction of the last-deployed allied unit. Kills the first allied unit it collides with.

name: 家族士兵
description: 家族基层成员，听从高层的命令行事，从不过问。他们的性命并不重要，但他们的死亡足以成为家族寻仇的理由。
ability: 被击倒时，使<@eb.key>“血债账款”</>略微增加.
talent: Upon death, increases "Blood Debt" by 20.

name: 家族精英士兵
description: 久经战场的家族基层成员，拳脚强劲，称得上是一流的打手。他们下葬的时候家族会送来吊唁信，但也仅此而已了。
ability: 被击倒时，使<@eb.key>“血债账款”</>小幅增加.
talent: Upon death, increases "Blood Debt" by 35.

name: 家族弩手
description: 家族训练的弩手，能从一定距离外发起攻击。家族配置的弩难称精良，所以收到紧急命令时，为了完成任务他们会用上不知从哪学来的简单法术。
ability: <@eb.key>“清算时刻”</>状态下，攻击变为法术伤害.
talent: During "Payback Time", attacks deal Arts damage.

name: 家族精英弩手
description: 经验丰富的家族弩手，他们的射击更加精准，自然更加致命。家族总是遵守规则的，并没有因此就给他们换上更好的弩，法术仍然必不可少。
ability: <@eb.key>“清算时刻”</>状态下，攻击变为法术伤害.
talent: During "Payback Time", attacks deal Arts damage.

name: 家族恫吓者
description: 家族训练的大力士，强壮的身材相当唬人。实际上比起拳头，家族更看重的是他们对叙拉古文明用语的充分掌握。
ability: <@eb.key>能吸引敌人攻击自己</>；被击倒时，使<@eb.key>“血债账款”</>增加.
talent: Taunt level increased by 1. Upon death, increases "Blood Debt" by 80.

name: 家族强暴恫吓者
description: 格外强壮的家族大力士，以火爆的脾气闻名大街小巷。他不会吝惜对他人直系亲属的频繁问候，但在关键问题上，他的嘴比最坚硬的岩石还要牢固。
ability: <@eb.key>能吸引敌人攻击自己</>；被击倒时，使<@eb.key>“血债账款”</>增加.
talent: Taunt level increased by 1. Upon death, increases "Blood Debt" by 80.

name: 家族术士
description: 家族训练的术师，源石技艺是他们在家族中立身的根本。虽然源石技艺的水平一般，煽动仇恨他们却是一把好手。
ability: 同时攻击两个目标。可以停止攻击，使<@eb.key>“血债账款”</>持续增加.
talent: None

0.name: Incite
0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect: Channels for up to 8s. During the channel, increases "Blood Debt" by 5 every second.

name: 家族精英术师
description: 技艺精湛的家族术师，往往能改变战场的局势。尽管自诩地位不低，但大家都知道，没了家族的庇护他们什么也不是。
ability: 同时攻击两个目标。可以停止攻击，使<@eb.key>“血债账款”</>持续增加.
talent: None

0.name: Incite
0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect: Channels for up to 8s. During the channel, increases "Blood Debt" by 5 every second.

name: 家族专用轿车
description: 家族中最常见的交通工具，内饰和外表一样普通，被加固的只有保险杠。除了代步，他们也会用这种轿车送家族的敌人“一路顺风”。
ability: 被击倒时若已被阻挡，将卸下三个<@eb.key>家族士兵</>.
talent: Upon death, if blocked, spawns 3 家族士兵 along its path.

name: 家族豪华轿车
description: 家族中较为少见的交通工具，外表低调但内饰豪华。通常只用来招待家族最为尊贵的宾客，并向他们传达家族某位高层的致意。
ability: 被击倒时若已被阻挡，将卸下三个<@eb.key>家族精英士兵</>.
talent: Upon death, if blocked, spawns 3 家族精英士兵 along its path.

name: 家族角头
description: 家族分部的领导者，德高望重，在家族中有不小的威势。传闻说他武器从不离身，但谁都不知道他把武器藏在了哪里，总不可能在雪茄里吧。
ability: 范围内有敌方单位被击倒时，使<@eb.key>“血债账款”</>增加.
talent: Whenever an enemy dies within a 1.8 tile radius (including itself), increases "Blood Debt" by 40.

name: 家族铁腕角头
description: 手段强硬的分部领导者，得到了许多家族成员的敬畏。家族兴起时他即存在，在潮流中安然屹立至今，似乎永远也不会倒下。
ability: 范围内有敌方单位被击倒时，使<@eb.key>“血债账款”</>增加.
talent: Whenever an enemy dies within a 1.8 tile radius (including itself), increases "Blood Debt" by 40.

name: 家族灭迹人
description: 忠于家族的强大杀手，于阴影中来去，留下的只有死亡。人人都知晓他的称号，却从未有人谈论他。
ability: <@eb.key>“清算时刻”</>状态下，自身获得额外增强。<$ba.invisible>隐匿</>.
talent: Invisible. During "Payback Time", ATK, DEF are increased by 15%, and ASPD is increased by 50.

name: 家族暗影灭迹人
description: 忠于家族的顶尖杀手，暗影是他的仆从，杀戮比覆手更轻易。令家族立足与兴盛的秘闻之中都有他的身影，得见他真容的人都已长眠于地下。
ability: <@eb.key>“清算时刻”</>状态下，自身获得额外增强。<$ba.invisible>隐匿</>.
talent: Invisible. During "Payback Time", ATK, DEF are increased by 15%, and ASPD is increased by 50.

name: 阿格尼尔神父
description: 阿格尼尔，萨科塔出身的神父，叙拉古统一秩序的建立者之一。别犹豫，他不一定站在你的对立面，但他的铳从不迟疑。顺带一提，他最爱的眼罩是龙门制造的。
ability: 使<@eb.key>“血债账款”</>逐渐增加；<@eb.key>“清算时刻”</>状态下，可以无视攻击距离。使用弹药攻击降低目标护甲，弹药上限：<@eb.key>10</>.
talent:
While present on the field, increases "Blood Debt" by 2 every second.

Displays Ammo bar. Initial and max Ammo is 10.
When Ammo is greater than or equal to 1, attacks consume 1 Ammo and decreases the target's DEF by 300 permanetly.
During "Payback Time", attack range is increased to the entire battlefield.

name: “与我无关”
description: 大摇大摆走出来的醉汉，帽子压得很低。至于战场上多出来的燃烧弹，反正与他无关。在口供里他向来都是如此陈述的。
ability: 每损失一定生命值，释放一个不会消失的燃烧区域。在燃烧区域中的我方干员每秒会受到真实伤害.
talent:
Does not attack. Cannot be blocked.
Activates [Fire Bomb] for every 30% of HP lost.

0.name: Fire Bomb
0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect: Throws a fire bomb centered on itself, creating a permanent 1.5 tile radius area that burns allied units for 100 True damage every second (stacks).

name: 叙拉古平民
description: 看上去像是意外闯入的叙拉古平民，明明战斗前已经疏散了群众，他们还是误入了激烈的战场。不知为何，只要他们出了意外，所有人的怒火就会降临在你身上。
ability: 撤回保护目标时不扣除关卡生命值；在场时使<@eb.key>“血债账款”</>缓慢减少，但死亡时使<@eb.key>“血债账款”</>大幅增加.
talent:
Neutral unit. Cannot be blocked.
Taunt level is increased by 1.
While present on the field, reduces "Blood Debt" by 1 every second (stacks).
Upon death, increases "Blood Debt" by 40.

name: 流泪小子
description: 唯唯诺诺的佩洛，离开家庭后正在寻找自己的新生活......不过别人是记不住那么多的，别人只知道他一直在流泪。
ability: 进入目标点也不会损失目标生命；<$ba.invisible>隐匿</>，攻击会<$ba.stun>晕眩</>目标.
talent:
Invisible (immediately restored after exiting block). Attacks stun the target for 4s.
When defeated, drops a relic after battle.

name: 骨海漂流体
description: 从大群骨骸中诞生的恐鱼，常常成群而动，一边寻找尸骨吞食养分，一边任由其他恐鱼捕食。
ability: 攻击额外造成<$ba.dt.erosion>侵蚀损伤</>.
talent: Attacks deal an additional 20% of ATK as Corrosion damage.

name: 固海凿石者
description: 拥有坚固外壳的恐鱼，栖居在大群外围，为整个大群阻挡敌人。
ability: 攻击范围内首次出现我方单位时，停止移动且防御力提升，持续一定时间.
talent: When attacking for the first time, stops moving and gains 300 DEF for 20s.

name: 投嗣育母
description: 一种以生育为主要职责的恐鱼，遇到致命威胁时会向敌人投掷拟嗣以便真正的恐鱼幼崽逃离战场。
ability: 只能攻击地面目标；造成伤害时，在目标周围召唤1个【注亡拟嗣】.
talent:
Can only attack units on ground tiles.
When attacking, summon a 注亡拟嗣 on the tile occupied by the target.

name: 注亡拟嗣
description: 它们是母体生命的延伸，外形上与其诞下的幼崽没有区别。
ability: 无法移动；会逐渐损失生命；攻击额外造成<$ba.dt.erosion>侵蚀损伤</>.
talent: Does not move. Takes 100 True damage per second. Attacks deal an additional 60% of ATK as Corrosion damage.

name: 掠海漂移体
description: 一种已初步适应天空环境的恐鱼，能够在不受阻碍的情况下一直在海面上滑行。这一分支持续进化后，或许能够衍生出永久居住在天空的后代。
ability: <$ba.float>近地悬浮</>；攻击额外造成<$ba.dt.erosion>侵蚀损伤</>.
talent:
Attacks deal an extra 50% of ATK as Corrosion damage.
Low-Altitude Hovering: cannot be blocked, can only be affected by ranged attacks. Immune to unbalance.
Loses this effect when affected by stun/sleep/frozen and becomes stunned for 0.5s. Attacks become melee after losing Low-Altitude Hovering.

name: 塑路者分形
description: 海嗣塑路者所留下的分形。幻影必定消散，路途满是歧误。仍要探索，仍要探索。
ability: 只能存活一段时间；每攻击2次后下次攻击召唤1个【塑路者分形】.
talent: When spawning, sets its HP percent to its summoner's HP percent. Leaves the battlefield after 90s.

0.name: 分形塑路
0.type: Attack Recovery
0.effect: Deals 100% of ATK as Physical damage. If there are less than 12 塑路者分形 on the field, spawns a 塑路者分形 along its path.

name: 伊莎玛拉之泪
description: 伊莎玛拉探索与争斗本质的具象。
ability: 出现在我方单位周围；每隔一段时间对目标造成真实伤害，若攻击范围内无目标则为【伊莎玛拉，腐化之心】充能；【伊莎玛拉，腐化之心】变身时消失.
talent:
Invulnerable. Does not attack, block, move, and cannot be healed.
The allied unit in the tile it occupies takes 100% of ATK as True damage every 3s. If there are no allied units in its tile, restores 25SP for Islar-mla the Corrupted Heart.

name: 箱形恐鱼
description: 一种拟态成宝箱模样的恐鱼，时常被深海主教用以保卫避难所。
ability: None
talent: When defeated, drops 10 Originium Ingots after battle.

name: 白垩，“尘世遗骸”
description: 被源石外壳层层包裹的白垩，其外形在莱塔尼亚唤起的只有恐惧。他阻止了尘世之音吞噬他人，自己却被尘世之音所吞噬。他试图拯救在场的所有人，拯救他的方法却只剩下一种。
ability: 攻击造成<@eb.key>溅射</>伤害且被阻挡时施加<$ba.stun>晕眩</>；【最后的休止符】初始防御和法抗较高；首次被击倒时暂时变为友方，随后失去防御和法抗加成，攻击和技能增强；【共振过载】令重整束流造成持续伤害；【虚无悲叹】依次攻击全场目标并失去大量生命值，处于重整束流上时<@eb.key>攻击速度下降</>.
talent:
Immune to unbalance and disarm.

First Form (Initial): DEF +800 (DEF +1000 at Level 1), RES +50.
Uses ranged attacks while not blocked with a 2.2 tile range. Ranged attacks have a splash radius of 0.8 tiles.
Uses melee attacks when blocked. Melee attacks have a splash radius of 0.8 tiles and stun the target for 6s.
Melee attacks enter cooldown when using a ranged attack, and vice versa.
Upon defeat, resurrects over 2.5s and restoring 100% of HP, while summoning large amounts of 黑水源石虫 (summons 黑水源石虫·α at Level 1). After resurrecting, enters 最后的休止符.

最后的休止符: invulnerable, cannot block, cannot move, cannot be targeted.
ATK interval is reduced by 4. Every attack increases the ATK interval by 0.1. Attacks target enemy units and become global. Attacks have a splash radius of 1.0 tiles.
After 40s, enters the Second Form.

Second Form: gains invulnerability for 5s, ATK +25%.
Uses ranged attacks while not blocked with a 3.2 tile range. Ranged attacks have a splash radius of 1.2 tiles.
Uses melee attacks when blocked. Melee attacks have a splash radius of 1.2 tiles and stun the target for 6s.
Melee attacks enter cooldown when using a ranged attack, and vice versa.

0.name: 共振过载
0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect: For 10s, all allied units within a 重整束流 is dealt 5% of ATK as Arts damage every 0.5s.

1.name: 虚无悲叹
1.type: Cooldown/s
1.effect:
Changes to Enraged Mode for 5s.

Does not move or trigger other skills while in this mode. ATK interval is reduced by 4.5/4.65. While within a 重整束流, ASPD is reduced by 50%. Normal attacks becomes global and prioritizes the closest allied unit that has not been attacked (priority resets after all allied units have been attacked), dealing 100% of ATK as Arts damage.

When this skill ends, loses 25% max HP (cannot be killed by this effect).

name: “唤醒”
description: 多萝西亲手制造的“梦境”，在这里，人们不必再忍受跋涉之苦。科技无法做到的事情，爱与希望可以。
ability: 无法移动；每隔一段时间将自己转移至指定地块并施放【破碎愿景】，对场上所有单位造成一次巨大物理伤害，该伤害将由所有友方单位平均分摊；每隔一段时间，向左右两个方向施放【旅程】，对首个击中的单位造成物理伤害；“唤醒”受到伤害时，将50%的伤害转移给场上其他多萝西实验体；第二形态下攻击力提升，立刻激活场上所有R系列动力装甲，【破碎愿景】还能使处于高台的单位<$ba.stun>晕眩</>并且“唤醒”会向周围4个方向施放【旅程】。.
talent:
Does not attack, does not move, cannot be blocked, cannot be unbalanced.
When Dorothy's 实验体 exist on the field, 50% of the damage taken will be diverted to all 实验体 on the field instead.

First Form (Initial): upon defeat, resurrects over 10s and restoring 100% of HP. After resurrecting, releases a new wave, fill the SP bar of all R-series 动力装甲 on the field and enters the Second Form

Second Form: ATK is increased by 25%.

0.name: 破碎愿景
0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect:
Blinks to the next checkpoint. After 4s, deals 500% of ATK as Physical damage to all allied units, split evenly between each allied unit.
In the Second Form, additionally stuns all allied ranged units for 15s.

1.name: 旅程
1.type: Cooldown/s
1.effect:
Fires a projectile towards its left/right, dealing 100% of ATK as Physical damage to the first allied unit it collides with.
In the Second Form, additionally fires projectiles up/down.

name: “物欲拮抗者”
description: 试图保护斯第奇·画布的施工用机械，误以为斯第奇即将遭受袭击。在解释原委之前，先用力量决出个高下吧。
ability: 在场时所有【机械】敌人变得更强；攻击会派出小无人机在一段时间内对目标持续造成法术伤害，优先攻击没有被小无人机锁定的目标；周期性刷新可以抵挡物理与法术伤害的护盾，护盾存在期间攻击范围内的其他敌人获得<$ba.invisible>隐匿</>；周期性锁定<@eb.key>身边人数最多的我方单位</>不断对其周围造成法术伤害；周期性锁定<@eb.key>身边人数最少的我方单位</>不断对其周围造成<$ba.stun>晕眩</>；生命值降为0时，斯第奇会出现并<$ba.stun>晕眩</>一段时间.
talent:
Upon entering the battlefield, gains a shield that absorbs up to 9999 Physical/Arts damage. While the shield persists, all unblocked enemies within its attack range gains invisibility.

Flying Mode (Initial): immune to Stun/Sleep/Frozen/Levitate. All [机械] enemies gains 20% increased ATK.
Normal attacks cause the target to take 20% of ATK as Arts damage every second for 15s. Prioritizes targets unaffected by this effect.

Resurrection: upon defeat, resurrects over 1s and restores 100% HP.
Becomes a ground unit after resurrection. If the checkpoint at (1, 1) is not reached, blink to the checkpoint and end the current wave.
After resurrecting, changes to Ejection Mode and becomes stunned for 30s.

Ejection Mode: DEF -400, RES -40, Movement Speed is increased to 200%.
Does not attack, cannot be blocked.

0.name: Refresh Shield [Flying Mode]
0.type: Cooldown/s
0.effect: Refreshes the shield strength.

1.name: Interference [Flying Mode]
1.type: Cooldown/s
1.effect: After 4.17s, selects the tile with the least number of allied units in the surrounding 8 tiles and causes an interference, stunning allied units on the tile and the 8 surrounding tiles for 3s every 5s, lasting until the next activation of this skill or until defeat.

2.name: Bombardment [Flying Mode]
2.type: Cooldown/s
2.effect: After 4.17s, selects the tile with the highest number of allied units in the surrounding 8 tiles and bombards it, dealing 100% of ATK as Arts damage to allied units on the tile and the 8 surrounding tiles every 5s, lasting until the next activation of this skill or until defeat.

name: “最后的蒸汽骑士”
description: 蒸汽骑士是维多利亚的荣耀，代表着维多利亚的最强战力和授予士兵的最高荣誉。最后一位蒸汽骑士于尘封的废墟中站起，为守护他心中的维多利亚而发起冲锋。
ability: 出场时攻击和移动速度降低，释放【蒸汽增压】后解除；【蒸汽增压】攻击和移动速度提升，且免疫控制，结束时眩晕；【怒守】蓄力攻击，造成更高的三次伤害；【誓死】每损失一定生命值后起飞，锁定我方<@eb.key>生命上限最高</>的单位，对其周围<@eb.key>生命比例最高</>的单位造成多次法术伤害；第二形态下防御和法术抗性降低，永久处于【蒸汽增压】，【誓死】额外锁定一个目标。.
talent:
Upon spawn, loses 50 ASPD and 50% Movement Speed. This debuff is lost after casting [Pressurized Steam].

Initial Mode: for every 50% HP lost, while not casting [Furious Guard], forcibly activate [Death Oath].
Releases the current wave after death, and resurrects over 8s, restoring 100% max HP. Gains invulnerability for 15s after resurrection and enters the Second Mode.

Second Mode: immediately casts [Death Oath]. The effects of [Pressurized Steam] becomes permanent. Loses 1500 DEF (2000 DEF at Level 1) and 40 RES.
For every 30% HP lost, while not casting [Furious Guard], forcibly activate [Death Oath].

0.name: Pressurized Steam

For 15s, gains 30% Movement Speed, 100 ASPD, and becomes immune to stun and freeze. Becomes stunned for 5s after the skill ends.

Immediately enters cooldown after cast (cycle changes to 40/40 at Level 1).

During the skill, gains unbalance immunity, stun immunity, freeze immunity, levitate immunity, and sleep immunity.

name: 扎罗，“狼之主”
description: 狼之主，自荒野中诞生，却将目光投向人世。自视甚高，机关算尽，然功亏一篑，满盘皆输。如今，该有人承受他的怒火了。
ability: 使<@eb.key>“血债账款”</>逐渐增加；受到伤害降低；【溶血骇惧】使三名我方单位被恐惧吞噬，不可主动撤退，攻速大幅降低，并逐渐加速失去生命值；受影响单位在“狼之主”损失一定比例生命时，会恢复正常；第一形态生命值降为0后，获得【远古威慑】，周围我方单位降低攻击速度，并缓慢回复生命值。第二形态下，不再拥有减伤，可被晕眩，且不再释放【溶血骇惧】。攻击变为远程二连击，且攻击力提升。每隔一段时间释放，【狂暴怒嗥】，使<@eb.key>“血债账款”</>快速上升.
talent:

Activates [Ancient Intimidation], causing all allied units within a 1.5 tile radius to have their ASPD reduced by 50.

Cooldown reduced to 10/15 when below 50% HP.

name: 粗圆岩
description: 圆岩巨像的组织物，无生命意识，但是很重，别被它附着在身上。
ability: 附着上干员身上；缓慢流失生命；使我方干员无法攻击、释放技能.
talent:
Loses 4% max HP every second. Does not attack, cannot be blocked, has unbalance immunity, gains 1.5s of invulnerability when appearing on the battlefield.
The Operator within a 0.3 tile radius is disarmed, silenced, cannot recover SP, and cannot be retreated. Leaves the field when the Operator leaves the field.

name: “漫游小屋”
description: 体型巨大的荧壳源石虫，背上丛生的肉幔间栖息着数量众多的幼体，因此爬行速度极慢。这类源石虫常年生活在地底深处，无从得知它为何出现在此处。虽然并未攻击人类，但它吞食着废弃的矿料，体型日渐增大，严重干扰了清理进程。
ability: 死亡时分裂<@eb.key>5个<荧壳源石虫></>；周期性加入“荧光孢子”到<@eb.key>待部署区</>，如拥挤则加入到<@eb.key>休整区</>.

name: 荧壳源石虫
description: 原生的壳类软体源石虫，繁衍能力极强，壳上的荧光为可视的信息素。蜕壳之后，体型会在短时间内急剧增大。
ability: None

name: “暴食之果”
description: 变异出触须状口器的巨型钳兽，其坚韧的“触须”歪打正着地提高了摄食效率。它不加甄别地摄入工业平台内部储存的种种原料，各种各样的危险物质在其体内持续反应，将清理工作变成了一场散发着异味的噩梦。
ability: 危险等级提升时，可以选择释放一种工业原料；受到伤害降低，减伤效果对阻挡自身的单位无效；生命值首次低于25%时，获得相当于当前最大生命值一定比例的护盾.
